original: Bergentz, Sven Algot, lektor, Uddevalla, f. 24/5/94 i Hästveda, Krist. I. G. 21 m. Nelly Skoglund. Barn: Lennart f. 26, Björn 30. — Stud:ex. II, fil. kand. 13, teol. kand. 15 o. teol. lic. 18, allt i Lund, provar v. norra latin i Sthlm 20, disp. f. lekt. 23. E. o. lektor i Uddevalla 18-19, e. o. adj. i Lidingö 20-21, ord. ämneslär. där 21, lektor v. Karlstads folksk:sem. 26, lektor i kristiend :kunsk. v. Uddevalla h. a. 1. sed. 31. Skr.: Grundtvigs re-1ig. idealism (akad. avh. 23), Pontus Wikner (34), Fromhetens kris h. Pontus Wikner (39), Ny reformation? (tills. m. fl. förf. 37). LNO.
translated: Bergentz, Sven Algot, lecturer, Uddevalla, b. May 24, 1894 in Hästveda, Kristianstad County. Married to Nelly Skoglund in 1921. Children: Lennart b. 1926, Björn b. 1930. He graduated from high school in 1913, earned a Bachelor's degree in 1913, a Master's degree in Theology in 1915, and a Doctoral degree in Theology in 1918, all from Lund University. He tried out for a teaching position at Norra Latin in Stockholm in 1920 and became a lecturer in Uddevalla from 1918-1919. He was an assistant teacher in Lidingö from 1920-1921, a regular subject teacher there in 1921, a lecturer at Karlstad People's Seminary in 1926, and a lecturer in Christian education in Uddevalla from 1931 to his retirement. He wrote several books, including Grundtvig's religious idealism (thesis, 1923), Pontus Wikner (1934), Crisis of Piety by Pontus Wikner (1939), and New Reformation? (with other authors, 1937). LNO.

structured.name: Sven Algot Bergentz
structured.disambiguatingDescription: Swedish lecturer and writer on religious topics

publication.name: Crisis of Piety by Pontus Wikner
